testCases.summary: Verify filtering transactions by Base Amount
testCases.preconditions: User is logged into the application and has access to the transaction list screen with multiple transactions

steps.step: Navigate to the transaction list screen
steps.expectedResult: Transaction list screen is displayed with all transactions

steps.step: Click the filter button for Base Amount column
steps.expectedResult: Filter options for Base Amount are displayed

steps.step: Select the most frequent amount value in the column
steps.expectedResult: Most frequent amount value is selected

steps.step: Verify filter button appearance and filtered results
steps.expectedResult: Filter button icon changes from hollow to filled, only transactions with selected amount are displayed

testCases.postconditions: Applied filter is shown above the transaction list table

testCases.summary: Verify filtering transactions by date range
testCases.preconditions: User is on the transaction list screen with transactions from multiple dates

steps.step: Click the filter button for Transaction Date column
steps.expectedResult: Date range filter options are displayed

steps.step: Enter the oldest date in the from field
steps.expectedResult: Oldest date is entered in from field

steps.step: Enter the second oldest date in the to field
steps.expectedResult: Second oldest date is entered in to field
Only transactions within specified date range are displayed

testCases.postconditions: Transaction list shows only transactions within selected date range

testCases.summary: Verify multiple filters and sorting functionality
testCases.preconditions: User is on the transaction list screen with multiple transaction types and accounts

steps.step: Filter Transaction Type column for CASH
Filter Account ID column for ACC001
steps.expectedResult: Only CASH transactions for ACC001 are displayed
Filtered transactions are sorted by amount while maintaining filters

testCases.postconditions: Filtered transactions remain sorted by amount

testCases.preconditions: User is on the transaction list screen with multiple filters applied

steps.step: Filter Transaction Type column for CASH
steps.expectedResult: Only Debit CASH transactions are displayed

steps.step: Click the Clear All Filters button
steps.expectedResult: All transactions are displayed and no filter icons are filled

testCases.postconditions: All filters are cleared and complete transaction list is displayed

testCases.preconditions: User is on the transaction list screen with ChatAI feature enabled

steps.step: Request ChatAI to show transactions with most frequent Base Amount and CASH type
steps.testData: Most frequent Base Amount: $1000.00, Type: CASH

steps.expectedResult: Transaction list updates with requested filters

steps.step: Filter Account ID column for ACC001
steps.expectedResult: Only ACC001 transactions are displayed while maintaining previous filters

testCases.postconditions: Transactions are filtered by ChatAI criteria and Account ID
